TopicTitle: What's up with the H.O.M.E. Mod???

Articles.Content: I really want to download HOME mod and I did but it froze on me. What's up with it? Is it outdated?

I think that mod is RAM hungry so you're probably hitting the limit and crashing before it can even start up. Remove some mods, use texture reducing packs and lower graphics settings to aid in your quest to get H.O.M.E.

Good luck E.T.!
